title: Keep Cellar Entrance
description: You've made your way out of the dungeon and find yourself in a delapitated area of the keep.  You keep still and try to scan the area with your senses.  It's dark and difficult to see.  It's extremely quiet, you can hear yourself breathe and hear your heart beat in your ear.  Suddenly, you hear a noise in the distance.  You're not alone. TO BE CONTINUED!?.
